title: shield-study-addon doc_type schema
description: Shield-Study-addon addon-specific data, sent as Map(s,s).  You may have to cast back at re:dash.

study_name.description: Name of a particular study.  Usually the addon_id.

branch.description: Which branch (variation) of the study the user has.

data.title: Shield-Study-Addon 'data' field.
data.description: Shield-Study-addon addon-specific data, sent as Map(s,s).  You may have to cast back at re:dash.

attributes.description: Map(string, string) of attributes of the addon data.
